controller

Class BidController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.BidController

  • public class BidController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles all controller operations pertaining to the Bid Controller

      • checkIfRoundBidIsOwnSchool

        public static boolean checkIfRoundBidIsOwnSchool(java.lang.String courseCode,
                                                 java.lang.String userId)
        Used in round 1 bidding which checks if the round bidded is offered by the user's school using the courseCode and userId
        Parameters:
        courseCode - bid's courseCode
        userId - student's userId
        Returns:
        true if the course bidded belongs to the user's own school, otherwise returns false

        Parameters:

        bidAmount - the bid's amount
        Returns:

      • checkIfClassTimeTableClashes

        public static boolean checkIfClassTimeTableClashes(java.lang.String courseCode,
                                                   java.lang.String sectionId,
                                                   java.lang.String userId,
                                                   Bid existingBid)
        Checks if the intended section to bid clashes with the classTimeTable of all current bids using courseCode,StringId and userId
        Parameters:
        courseCode - courseCode of section
        sectionId - the sectionId of section
        userId - the student's userid
        existingBid - the existing bid if this is an update of bid
        Returns:
        true if the classTimeTable clashes with the ones present in the current bid list

                                      java.lang.String sectionCode,
                                      int sectionVacancy)

        Parameters:
        courseCode - courseCode of section
        sectionCode - sectionCode
        sectionVacancy - number of vacant seats in the section
        Returns:
        the clearing price of that round
